me.Abhigya.core.database.mongo

Class MongoDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.database.mongo.MongoDocument

  • public class MongoDocument
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for interacting with a Mongo database collection docuemnts.
